Summary: Colors like my dreams..red gold and green.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Nescopeck
There were no other sightings in Nescopeck on or around July 3rd 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI awoke from a sleep to find small grey child like men at the foot of my bed..i couild not awake my husband Russell....I tried to call for help but could not. Then the small men ran from my room and climbed abourd their starship and headed for the skies. I was able to move and when I woke Russell he said he had a dream that little men were holding us down.
